snippet.title: RPG Chronus Arc - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
©2012-2013 KEMCO/Hit-Point

'RPG Chronus Arc' is now available for Android/iOS!
Venture through puzzle-filled dungeons to bring the past back to the present!

Download it now on
App Store:
https://itunes.apple.com/app/id732544756?mt=8
Google Play:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=kemco.hitpoint.chronus

Loka is a young boy who is training to become a Sorcerer Knight. He is heading off to get the Chronus Fragments, which are needed for the ceremony of 'Time Rewinding', in which the current world is overwritten by the past. However, the sudden appearance of a mysterious man intent on stealing the Fragments changes all this, and Loka finds himself on a quest with his childhood friend, Princess Sarna.

- Dungeons with mysterious puzzles to solve
- Incredible monster animations
- Class changes to strenghten your characters
- Tutorial function to make play easy even for beginners
- Extra dungeons to explore

※All graphics terms, characters and elements are subject to change in the actual product.
